word:
REPORT OF THE INTERVIEW 

     BROTHER AND SISTER MACKIN STATED THAT THEY HAD FELT IMPRESSED BY THE HOLY SPIRIT TO MAKE A SPECIAL TRIP WEST IN ORDER TO INTERVIEW SISTER WHITE REGARDING SOME UNUSUAL EXPERIENCES THROUGH WHICH THEY HAD BEEN PASSING. DURING THE WEEK OF PRAYER NEARLY THREE YEARS BEFORE THEY 
                                                                           364
HAD UNITED WITH THEIR LITTLE CHURCH AT FINDLAY, OHIO, IN A SPECIAL SEASON OF SEEKING GOD FOR THE OUTPOURING OF THE HOLY SPIRIT.
